total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation of the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Notice that the output grid is a smaller section of the input grid. Determine the location of this section in the input grid.
Q3: Identify if there are any specific conditions or patterns that determine which section of the input grid is selected for the output.
Q4: Determine if there are any transformations or changes made to the selected section before it becomes the output grid.
Q5: Apply the identified pattern or rule to the input grid of the quiz to predict the output grid.

Q2: Notice that the output grid is a smaller section of the input grid. Determine the location of this section in the input grid.
Q3: Identify if there are any specific conditions or rules that determine which section of the input grid is selected for the output.
Q4: Determine if the values in the output grid are transformed or if they remain the same as in the input grid.
Q5: Apply the identified rules and conditions to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
